text: "I Wanna Be Sedated" is a 1978 song by Ramones. It was taken from their fourth studio album Road to Ruin. It was later issued as a single in the Netherlands. It was used in the 1980 movie Times Square. It was certified Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). Rolling Stone ranked it #145 on their list of 500 Greatest Songs of All Time. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Punk rock songs Category:The Ramones songs Category:The Offspring songs
title: I Wanna Be Sedated
